EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners - Time Card Reminder (1337032094.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners - Time Card Reminder (1337032094.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Russell, You are welcome. You don’t need to pay too much attention to these emails they are geared toward hourly contractors who may have forgotten to enter their time. If you would like to turn off this email notification you may do so by logging in and updating your account settings in the upper right hand menu. I am asking our HR to back out the dental benefits; once they do this I will have our finance adjust your leger. Hope you are doing well – good to hear from you! Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> russell.klein.101@gmail.com [mailto:russell.klein.101@gmail.com] On Behalf Of Russell Klein Sent: Sunday, May 13, 2012 11:00 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners - Time Card Reminder Thanks for the reminder, Sara.Fixed it. Please let me know if there is any data missing. At this time, I do notice a $49 charge for dental. This should be unnecessary since I am back with DC government; dunno if this is an expense that can be removed, however. As mentioned, I AM able to do the RK & Associates side business, so it's still my intention to work with MBO. Russell On Sun, May 13, 2012 at 6:56 PM, <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:According to our records, there is no time entered in the period indicated for the following work order(s):
Start Stop Work Order 04/25/2012 04/30/2012 1101 Wootton Parkway Presentation 04/23/2012 04/30/2012 2000 Tower Oaks Blvd Presentation
Click this link to go to login page: https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=TimeSheetEntry <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=TimeSheetEntry>
This is a system generated email that you have requested by selecting it on the System Notification page.
